sense.name: a declaration that is a binding commitment, an oath
sense.commentary: PROMISE[+event][+speech_act][+declaration][+commitment][+binding] Note: implies a person/agent verbally placing themselves under an obligation to do something.
sense.examples: He has broken his promise to the American people not to raise taxes. She left the meeting early with a promise to send us the drawings tomorrow. Their promises of support never materialized.

sense.name: an indication of a future desirable outcome
sense.examples: After a two-month drought, the skies finally held the promise of rain. He shows great promise as a theoretical physicist. After this event there is little promise of a peace accord.
